XData.name: KPI
XData.Description: This XData definition defines the KPI.
XData.Data: <kpi xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee/kpi" name="CurrSysData" sourceType="sql" caption="Current System Data" > <property columnNo="1" name="ID" /> <property columnNo="2" name="DateTime" /> <property columnNo="3" name="SysCPUIdle" /> <property columnNo="4" name="SysCPUKernel" /> <property columnNo="5" name="SysCPUUser" /> <property columnNo="6" name="SysLicUsedDist" /> <property columnNo="7" name="SysLicUsedLocal" /> </kpi>

Method.name: %OnLoadKPI
Method.Description: Notification that this KPI is being executed. This is a good place to override properties, such as range and threshold.

Method.name: %OnGetSQL
Method.Description: Return an SQL statement to execute.
Method.Implementation: set pSQL = "SELECT top 1 ID, DateTime, Sys_CPUIdle, Sys_CPUKernel, Sys_CPUUser, Sys_LicUsedDist, Sys_LicUsedLocal "_ "FROM SYS_History.SysData order by DateTime Desc" Quit $$$OK

Method.name: %OnDashboardAction
Method.Description: This callback is invoked from a dashboard when an action defined by this dashboard is invoked.
